title: Hatchlings Curse
description: Lord Branin Llewlyn is a dragshi, a human who can exchange bodies with a dragon. After millennia of waiting...and searching, Branin and his dragon counterpart, Llewlyn, have found their intended mates.For the dragshi, the freedom of flight comes with a price. Now Branin has to find a cure for the childlessness of his kind. Cryptic references to mating flights add hope, but dark references about the deaths of suitors threatens not only his life, but the dreams of all dragon shifters.Even if the curse is broken, the firebrand leader of an outlaw band, Lady Broch of Ky'Port, has sworn to have Branin on his knees at her feet.
author: Helen B. Henderson
